Friends

class IndicatorBarView

Detailed Description

An IndicatorBar is a DrawableObject to display indicators. The indicator bar positions and draws attached Indicators.

void IndicatorBar::OnUpdate (  ObservableObject *  obs_obj  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked when the state of the Observable-Object obs_obj has been changed. To get invoked by the Observable-Object the Observer must attach itself by ObservableObject::Attach(this).
